context.title: Tycho Target Editor (Incubation)
context.description: LDI specific target file editor. The editor introduces an additional page providing a LDI specific view of the target definition file. References to p2 repositories located in Nexus are provided with additional Maven and Project Portal related information. This first milestone implementation displays Maven GAV information and determines all available versions of the referenced repositories.
Choose a repository from a list of recommendations or specify Maven coordinates of one to add it to the target definition
